effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,927 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3 million Fire damage to your primary target and 244,454 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Frontman's Wondrous Wall
description: It's gonna be the one that saves you.
